Hall of Beginnings.description: Large marble columns tower over you, bearing the weight of a vast stone ceiling. An ornate stone archway covers the north area of the room, containing a shimmering, purple portal. A lady garbed in a white dress stands in front of the portal, barring entry to those she sees fit.

portal.description: Attempting to peer around the woman standing in front, you can make out tall buildings, and cobbled pathways.

Hallway of Knowledge.description: The hallway is fairly long and along the walls are stone pedestals, holding large tablets with engraved writing.

Testing Chambers.description: This room is much smaller than the hall. Along the walls are racks of basic weapons and armor, fit for all kinds of adventurers. A single chest lies in the middle of the room. A man stands next to the chest waiting for adventurers to approach.

sword rack.description: The rack holds seemingly unending amounts of swords. Try TAKE TRAINING SWORD FROM SWORD RACK.

staff rack.description: The rack holds seemingly unending amounts of staves. Try TAKE TRAINING STAFF FROM STAFF RACK.

bow rack.description: The rack holds seemingly unending amounts of bows. Try TAKE TRAINING BOW FROM BOW RACK.

plate rack.description: The rack holds seemingly unending amounts of platebodies. Try TAKE TRAINING PLATE FROM PLATE RACK.

leather rack.description: The rack holds seemingly unending amounts of leather bodices. Try TAKE TRAINING BODICE FROM LEATHER RACK.

robe rack.description: The rack holds seemingly unending amounts of cloth robes. Try TAKE TRAINING ROBES FROM ROBE RACK.

chest.description: Upon the chest lies a heavy brass lock. Once you have the key, try UNLOCK CHEST, then OPEN CHEST, then LOOK IN CHEST.
